subject: Re: Business sponsorship!! Get up
body:
If you are interested to deal with us kindly furnish us with the below
required details as our official requirements to enable us start the
processing of your requested sponsorship amount*.*



Company Name (if available):...........

First Name:.................

Middle Name:...........

Last Name:.......

Age:.............

Sex:....................

Marital Status:............

Office Phone / Fax:..........

Mobile:..............

Current Contact Address:.......

City:......................

State/Province:............

Country:...................

Occupation:..............

Monthly Income……..

Annual Income:......................

Sponsorship Amount needed:……………..



 Once we are in receipt of the above details from you, we will send you the
sponsorship calculation/repayment draft.



Sincerely Yours,

Monebglobal Team

subject: Re: Business sponsorship!! Get up
body:
Hello Team,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about your offer. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify what exactly the deal entails? What kind of services or products are you offering?

Also, could you please explain what the repayment draft is and how it works? I want to make sure I fully understand the process before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: Business sponsorship!! Get up
body:
Kindly fill in your details, and send it to us then we can send you your
repayment calculations draft

subject: Re: Business sponsorship!! Get up
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your offer to help with my repayment draft. Before I proceed, could you please provide me with some more information? I just want to make sure everything is clear before I send anything. Could you let me know what kind of repayment draft this is and how it works?

Best wishes,
Matthew
